name: Dispel
effect:
:instant: Remove all :ongoing: effects from a space or a \* [unit](../units/index.md) and the space it occupies.

:empower: 0 ➣ \*:bronze:
:empower: 1 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver:
:empower: 2 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver: or :golden:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: Global effects that are not bound to a specific unit (e.g. Archery) may not be removed.
